snippet: British retail sales growth slowed last month after a bumper April, pegged back by slumping food sales, the British Retail Consortium said on Tuesday....

headline.print_headline: Retail Sales Growth Eases in May, Pegged Back by Food-BRC
headline.main: Retail Sales Growth Eases in May, Pegged Back by Food-BRC

lead_paragraph: British retail sales growth slowed last month after a bumper April, pegged back by slumping food sales, the British Retail Consortium said on Tuesday.
